title: Remembering
creator_credit: Laura Brearley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Laura Brearley’s dear friend died of cancer, Brearley took solace in her art, her music and remembering. In doing this, Brearley gave the gift of comfort to many others.
creator_credit_for_label: Laura Brearley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
